trans-unit.source: Creates and deletes Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 virtual roots.
trans-unit.target: 建立和刪除網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6.0 虛擬根目錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface defines methods for creating and deleting virtual roots in IIS 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>介面會定義方法，用於建立和刪除 IIS 6.0 中的虛擬根目錄。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented only by the IISVirtualRoot class and is used only within the .NET Framework infrastructure while creating a SOAP-enabled COM+ application virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 此介面僅由 IISVirtualRoot 類別所實作，而且僅用於.NET Framework 基礎結構時建立的 SOAP 啟用 COM + 應用程式虛擬根目錄。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>不需要直接在您的程式碼中實作。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class, which implements the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface that contains the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>類別，它會實作<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>介面，其中包含<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>和<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>未完全實作<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: IISVirtualRoot is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework IISVirtualRoot 會在內部使用。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要在您的程式碼中直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 建立網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 虛擬根目錄。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call the Create method from your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要從您的程式碼呼叫 Create 方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string with the value `"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"` representing the root Web server.
trans-unit.target: 具有值的字串`"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"`代表根 Web 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root, which corresponds to `PhysicalPath` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: 對應於虛擬根目錄的實體路徑`PhysicalPath`從<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root, which corresponds to `VirtualRoot` from <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬根目錄中，對應於名稱`VirtualRoot`從<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 可寫入錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: Deletes an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 刪除網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 虛擬根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Even though it is public, the Delete method is not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 即使是公用的刪除方法不是直接呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, there is the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 另外，還有<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, this method is not fully implemented.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這個方法未完全實作。

trans-unit.source: The root Web server, as specified by `RootWebServer` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: 根 Web 伺服器，必須按照`RootWebServer`從<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot*>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬根目錄的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬根目錄的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 可寫入錯誤訊息字串。
